member.name: T:Google.Apis.Util.Store.FileDataStore
member.summary: File data store that implements . This store creates a different file for each combination of type and key. This file data store stores a JSON format of the specified object.

member.name: M:Google.Apis.Util.Store.FileDataStore.#ctor(System.String,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Constructs a new file data store. If fullPath is false the path will be used as relative to , otherwise the input folder will be treated as absolute. The folder is created if it doesn't exist yet.
member.param: Defines weather the folder parameter is absolute or relative to .

member.name: M:Google.Apis.Util.Store.FileDataStore.StoreAsync``1(System.String,``0)
member.summary: Stores the given value for the given key. It creates a new file (named ) in .
member.typeparam: The type to store in the data store.
member.param: The value to store in the data store.

member.name: M:Google.Apis.Util.Store.FileDataStore.DeleteAsync``1(System.String)
member.summary: Deletes the given key. It deletes the named file in .
member.param: The key to delete from the data store.

member.name: M:Google.Apis.Util.Store.FileDataStore.GetAsync``1(System.String)
member.summary: Returns the stored value for the given key or null if the matching file ( in doesn't exist.
member.param: The key to retrieve from the data store.

member.name: M:Google.Apis.Util.Store.FileDataStore.ClearAsync
member.summary: Clears all values in the data store. This method deletes all files in .
